name: Travis Beacon Teaches Fighting
description:
A Rhythm-Typing game with a fighting flavour.

Defeat the four challengers to defend your crown (the one you aren’t wearing. you probably left it at home).

Made with Unity / Doodle Studio 95 / Pocket Operators for Ludum Dare 41 (48 hour game jam).

[sound warning! as in…there is sound. so hear that. but careful its not too loud at first. it kind of comes in all of a sudden. sorry]
